TWITTER_ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET.description: Your Twitter app access token secret

TWITTER_TRACK.description: Comma separated list of words to track

EINSTEIN_ACCOUNT_ID.description: Email address used to create Einstein account

SF_CONSUMER_KEY.description: Consumer key of your Salesforce Connected App

SF_CONSUMER_SECRET.description: Consumer secret of your Salesforce Connected App

SF_USER_NAME.description: Salesforce username for your integration user

SF_USER_PASSWORD.description: Salesforce password for your integration user

SF_ENVIRONMENT.description: Salesforce environment. Enter production (for regular developer edition orgs) or sandbox (for scratch orgs)
